title: Grant of IOD/C
clause_text: Grant of IOD/C.C/O.C. or issuance of any written instructions to ensure public safety or reduce nuisance/inconvenience does not render MCGM liable for any injury, damages or loss whatsoever that may be caused to anyone in and around the construction area/site.
